attributes.action: Censor the tabloid media for hateful and abusive journalism.
attributes.additional_details: The recent Tabloid headlines denigrating the Supreme Court Judges, the phone-hacking scandal of the Sun and just about every other daily headline and article that comments on women's appearances, their age, size or otherwise. Tabloids have become propaganda in the guise of real journalism.
attributes.background: The tabloid media perpetuate their own political agenda, rather than cover stories in an unbiased and fair and impartial manner. They use shock-headlines as propoganda and this has a detrimental effect on our society.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like to complain about specific articles, you may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
